name: Naughty Girl - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The Naughty Girl - Original soundtrack is a pack with all the 8 Original tracks made for the game. Now you can relax with the songs of the game while doing anything else!

  • Leon Richards III - Synthetic
  • Leon Richards III - Lost Tears
  • Leon Richards III - Meaningless Words
  • Leon Richards III - Lessons in White
  • Leon Richards III - Time Spent
  • Leon Richards III - Fallen Leaves
  • Leon Richards III - Worthfull
  • Leon Richards III - Presentation

The Songs are on MP3 format and can be found on the game's folder.
'\Steam\steamapps\common\Naughty Girl\Soundtrack'

short_description: The Naughty Girl - Original soundtrack is a pack with the Original tracks made for the game. Now you can relax with the songs of the game while doing anything else!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ or Better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 or later
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHZ or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 or later
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
